channel.title: © Hawaiian Island Development Team ©
channel.description:
[center][b]Hawaiian Island[/b][/center]
Hello, Over the past few weeks i have been deciding weather or not to make another server............And i have decided "YES"! The server is Going to be called "Hawaiian Island", becuase it is located on a little island in the middle of no-where!
Here are some pictures of what i have done so far with the server:
1. Here is where you start on the server: [IMG]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z37/master_montage/hometele.jpg[/img]
2. Here is where you train on the server: [IMG]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z37/master_montage/trainingdock.jpg[/img]
3. Here is where you mine on the server: [IMG]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z37/master_montage/mining.jpg[/img]
4. Here is where the admins can go: [IMG]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z37/master_montage/admintown.jpg[/img]
5. Here is where you fight jad: [IMG]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z37/master_montage/jad.jpg[/img]
6. Here is a picture of the stats: [IMG]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z37/master_montage/stats.jpg[/img]
7. Here is where you shop on the server: [IMG]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z37/master_montage/Shopetele.jpg[/img]
[center][b]Postions[/b][/center]
Server coder:
[ul][li]1: ME[/li] [li]2:[/li] [li]3:[/li][/ul]
Webclient Maker:
[ul][li]1:[/li] [li]2:[/li][/ul]
Client Maker:
[ul][li]1: ME[/li] [li]2:[/li] [li]3:[/li][/ul]
Forums Maker:
[ul][li]1: ME[/li] [li]2:[/li] [li]3:[/li][/ul]
Testers:
[ul][li]1:[/li] [li]2:[/li] [li]3:[/li] [li]4:[/li] [li]5:[/li] [li]6:[/li] [li]7:[/li] [li]8:[/li] [li]9:[/li] [li]10:[/li][/ul]
[center]What The Server Needs[/center]
[ul][li]1- Need the island which it is based on to be a safezone[/li] [li]2- Need a server restarter[/li][/ul]
( I will think of more as we go..... Those are just the main ones!!! )
[center]Aplication[/center]
[b]PLEASE[/b] Use the following layout to apply for a postition:
[code] Name on Forums: Postion(s) your applying for: Why should i give you this postion: Other things to help you get the postion: [/code]
If You have any other questions feel free to post them or email me at love2ride_12@hotmail.com!!
Thanks
